title: JeremyW99
author: JeremyW99
content: ALGO has done a full retracement. 0.09 to almost $3 back to 0.09. Here's an updated analysis of the chart: https://youtu.be/IxZcmKGVzbM?si=iRFyDOrtqnWXnyD1When that falling wedge breaks, I think it's gonna explode.

comments.author: Magic-Money
comments.body: That's a good entry point to buy more ALGO Coin by taken the advantage of double bottom retraced  to buy and hold for a long term investment, while waiting for next Bull Run market to come. Hence, the level of preparation base on the alt-coins accumulated will determine profits returns in the near future.

comments.author: TravelMug
comments.body: Quote from: Magic-Money on August 31, 2023, 12:17:36 PMThat's a good entry point to buy more ALGO Coin by taken the advantage of double bottom retraced  to buy and hold for a long term investment, while waiting for next Bull Run market to come. Hence, the level of preparation base on the alt-coins accumulated will determine profits returns in the near future.Of course, if it had bottom down and get a full retracement, then it's a good buying opportunity. Bust still though, it might have a good run in the future, reaches new all time high, or will just simply tank. The best thing to do is to really do your own research with this project.Quote from: JeremyW99 on August 31, 2023, 03:22:52 AMALGO has done a full retracement. 0.09 to almost $3 back to 0.09. Here's an updated analysis of the chart: https://youtu.be/IxZcmKGVzbM?si=iRFyDOrtqnWXnyD1When that falling wedge breaks, I think it's gonna explode. Didn't watch the video though, but it's too early to say whether it will exploded. I mean almost all altcoins is down -90% from it's all time high. If it will explode I think that best time will be next year. So if you really believed in this project, accumulate as much as you can.

comments.author: o48o
comments.body: Quote from: JeremyW99 on August 31, 2023, 03:22:52 AM-cut-When that falling wedge breaks, I think it's gonna explode. When is that happening? Not today that's for sure as it's aready dropped from the video's $0.0961 ro $0.09298. So i am not seeing any breakout. It has been dropping for 2 years now so i won't be holding my breath that it would breakout when bitcoin just dropped a bit.If you think it's a good project, then you shoud definitely buy some as it hasn't been this cheap ever.

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: If you are monitoring that coin then you think that it's good to buy it, you have to buy it. As you say it's from $3, that was its launching price and then it dropped a lot afterward. Yeah, looking at that perspective, you think that it's good to buy it.Quote from: Magic-Money on August 31, 2023, 12:17:36 PMHence, the level of preparation base on the alt-coins accumulated will determine profits returns in the near future.It's like another lottery when the bull run market arrives. That's why if someone chasing to own some altcoins before the bull run and checking coins like this, it's your preference and make sure that you have done analysis for it.

comments.author: TastyChillySauce00
comments.body: Quote from: JeremyW99 on August 31, 2023, 03:22:52 AMALGO has done a full retracement. When you were creating this post and the price of algo was still around 9,7 cents but after your made this post, it's dumped to the 9,3 cents. It sounds bad for people who follow your pattern. Quote from: JeremyW99 on August 31, 2023, 03:22:52 AM0.09 to almost $3 back to 0.09. That's and evidence if this token was just pump and dump token. I told you that if ATH of algo was far away from touching $3. How can you say that if it's almost touched $3? It sounds non sense to hear that and we are not in the bullish market again. The chance for algo to follow your prediction is almost zero. Quote from: JeremyW99 on August 31, 2023, 03:22:52 AMWhen that falling wedge breaks, I think it's gonna explode. You can only count on the next pump that will happen in the future but no ETA for when the pump will be coming in again. Everything is changing a lot when there have been many crisis happened in the world.

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: Quote from: JeremyW99 on August 31, 2023, 03:22:52 AMALGO has done a full retracement. 0.09 to almost $3 back to 0.09. When that falling wedge breaks, I think it's gonna explode. It's not a full retracement but it's a good definition of pump dump coin as the price goes up to a crazy level, starts crashing and goes back to that very low price, the difference between the ATH price is too big and it's impossible to go back to it, the cryptocurrency promises that it will go back to that level but the price won't increase again.These conditions apply to ALGO, and therefore I say that the price will not return to the $3 level again.price will back to $1 as new ATH and will be between .1 to 1
